net.sf.JRecord.Numeric

Interface Convert

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.sf.cb2xml.def.IBasicDialect, ICopybookDialects
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicConvert, CommaDecimal, GenericNumericDefinition, MicroFocusCobol

    public interface Convert
extends ICopybookDialects, net.sf.cb2xml.def.IBasicDialect
    This interface describes a class that will convert a Cobol Type (picture / usage) into a JRecord.type identifier
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
